contexts.context: ...very different kind of society, one that he had been <mark>ill</mark>-equipped to deal with. They were poor.
Not long afterwards, Sedura Indoril Pavflek Mamoona fell <mark>ill</mark> and died, despite all the skills of the great healers...
...; there are no trails or marked routes. Casual travelers <mark>ill</mark>-equipped for the attacks of wild beasts and brigands should...
